short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly convert currencies with real-time exchange rates. Perfect for shopping, travel, or financial tracking in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert almost all world currencies with ease. Supporting 99% of UN-recognized states and territories, our extension ensures accurate, real-time exchange rates, updated daily. Even without internet connectivity, you can continue using it seamlessly.

Fast, secure, and user-friendly, this browser extension simplifies shopping, travel, and financial tasks.
